alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Prowers County Including Lamar (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 01 at 8:27PM MDT until April 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 236 AND 237... ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR THIS EVENING HAS EXPIRED... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 236 and 237. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Prowers County Including Lamar
